description: Describes the updates of a directory for a particular update type.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the directory.

parameters.name: UpdateType
parameters.description: The type of updates you want to describe for the directory.

nested_items.name: UpdateActivities
nested_items.description: The list of update activities on a directory for the requested update type.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the update performed on the directory.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the current status of the update type activity.

nested_items.name: InitiatedBy
nested_items.description: This specifies if the update was initiated by the customer or by the service team.

nested_items.name: OSVersion
nested_items.description: OS version that the directory needs to be updated to.

nested_items.name: PreviousValue
nested_items.description: The old value of the target setting.

nested_items.name: OSVersion
nested_items.description: OS version that the directory needs to be updated to.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the UpdateDirectorySetup for the particular type.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The last updated date and time of a particular directory setting.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If not null, more results are available. Pass this value for the NextToken parameter.
